title: Unlocking the Potential of Unlabeled Data in Semi-Supervised Domain Generalization
details: D Lee, K Hwang, N Kwak - arXiv preprint arXiv:2503.13915, 2025
abstract: We address the problem of semi-supervised domain generalization (SSDG), where the distributions of train and test data differ, and only a small amount of labeled data along with a larger amount of unlabeled data are available during training. Existing …
